emails.subject: Security alert
emails.body:
[image: Google]
You allowed email-ai access to some of your Google Account data


badakoomia@gmail.com

If you didn’t allow email-ai access to some of your Google Account data,
someone else may be trying to access your Google Account data.

Take a moment now to check your account activity and secure your account.
Check activity
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?Email=badakoomia@gmail.com&continue=https://myaccount.google.com/alert/nt/1755060078000?rfn%3D127%26rfnc%3D1%26eid%3D3822032856342823794%26et%3D0>
To make changes at any time to the access that email-ai has to your data,
go to your Google Account
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?Email=badakoomia@gmail.com&continue=https://myaccount.google.com/connections/overview/AXgE0HOCWYm6_r7A6tMwH92AOZRl6lGmVtIjezbAN0PjFEDEy3pnQeFs_eml0BYM5-Jxk2ddQqncQnlt0HDHTxlt6N4?utm_source%3Dsec_alert%26utm_medium%3Demail_notification%26force_all%3Dtrue>
You can also see security activity at
https://myaccount.google.com/notifications
You received this email to let you know about important changes to your
Google Account and services.
© 2025 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
emails.summary:
Here's a summarized version of the email in bullet points:

*   **Important Security Alert:** Email-ai (a third-party app) has access to your Google Account data.
*   **Verify Access:** Google recommends you check your account activity immediately to ensure this access is legitimate. Use the provided link.
*   **Review & Revoke (if needed):** You can manage or remove email-ai's access to your data through your Google Account settings, also linked in the email.
emails.draft:
Hi,

Thanks for the alert. I'll check my account activity immediately and review the access email-ai has to my data. I appreciate you sending this notification.

emails.subject: Re: Security alert
emails.body: Thank you for your email! Let's discuss this further.
emails.summary:
*   **Acknowledged Receipt:** The sender received your email.
*   **Further Discussion Needed:** They want to talk more about the topic.

emails.subject: Security alert
emails.body:
[image: Google]
A new sign-in on Windows


badakoomia@gmail.com
We noticed a new sign-in to your Google Account on a Windows device. If
this was you, you don’t need to do anything. If not, we’ll help you secure
your account.
Check activity
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?Email=badakoomia@gmail.com&continue=https://myaccount.google.com/alert/nt/1755057370268?rfn%3D325%26rfnc%3D1%26eid%3D-5581385369441842557%26et%3D0>
You can also see security activity at
https://myaccount.google.com/notifications
You received this email to let you know about important changes to your
Google Account and services.
© 2025 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
emails.summary:
Here's a summary of the email in bullet points:

*   **New Sign-in:** Google detected a new sign-in to your account (`badakoomia@gmail.com`) from a Windows device.
*   **If It Was You:** No action needed.
*   **If It Wasn't You:** Click the "Check activity" link or visit `myaccount.google.com/notifications` to secure your account.

emails.subject: Your Google Account was recovered successfully
emails.body:
[image: Google]
Account recovered successfully


badakoomia@gmail.com
Welcome back to your accountIf you suspect you were locked out of your
account because of changes made by someone else, you should review &
protect your account.
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?Email=badakoomia@gmail.com&continue=https://myaccount.google.com/secure-account?utm_source%3Demail%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3Dph%26src%3D14%26aneid%3D-5159381867427061671>
You received this email to let you know about important changes to your
Google Account and services.
© 2025 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
emails.summary:
Here's a summary of the email in bullet points:

*   **Account Recovery:** Your Google account (badakoomia@gmail.com) has been successfully recovered.
*   **Review Security:** Google recommends reviewing and securing your account if you suspect unauthorized changes.
*   **Action Required (Optional):** Click the provided link to review and protect your account.
emails.draft:
Hi,

Thanks for letting me know my account was recovered successfully. I'll review and protect my account using the link provided.

emails.summary:
Here's a summary of the email in bullet points:

*   **New Google Account Sign-in:** Google detected a new sign-in on a Windows device.
*   **Check if it was you:** If you signed in, no action is needed.
*   **Secure your account if it wasn't you:** Click the "Check activity" link to review the sign-in and secure your account if necessary.
